item.title: The Ninja Café Luxe espresso machine drops to an all time Aussie low for Black Friday – grab one now from AU$629
item.description: The Ninja Luxe Café Premier espresso machine caused quite the stir when it launched in Australia – it's now available for its lowest price yet in the Black Friday sales.
